1.content: Choose a Final Fantasy character.
1.title: Choose your character!

choices: On a beach during a sunny day.
On what looks like an airship but not the one you know.
11.content:
You are Cloud. You wake up confused.

"Huh??" you say. "Where am I?"
"Last thing I remember is falling into the lifestream..."

You look up and see people surrounding you.

Where are you??
11.title: Confusion

choices: Find Sarah and ask if she's seen your friends
111.content:
"He's alive!" one of the people exclaim. It's a child in a swimsuit. You sit up and see you're surrounded by children. The sun is shining bright above you and salt has crystilized on your clothing. You are on a crowded beach.

"Where am I?" you ask. The oldest child, with brown hair answers.

"Miami." You've never heard of any place by this name.

"Is it near Midgar?" you ask. They give you a strange look. A woman with long black hair in a pony tail, wearing baggy clothing, approaches, and the children scatter.

"You're awake," she says, "Good. We'll take you to the hospital anyway to make sure you're not injured. What's your name?" She helps you up.

"Cloud," you answer.

"I'm Sarah," she says and looks you up and down. "Interesting outfit." You look at your clothing.

"This is what I always wear," you say. She laughs and escorts you to a white vehicle that has "Ambulence" printed on the side. She helps you into the vehicle.

--------------------------------

The doctor releases you with a clean bill of health. You decide to....
111.title: Miami Beach

112.content: You wake up with the sound of wind in your ears. It's familiar, so close you can almost remember what it is. "An Airship!" you say to yourself. You wake up in an oaken room. Beside you is a rather beautiful young lady. You notice that her hair is green. " So, who are you?" You manage to stammer out, " C-Cloud...Cloud Strife.." "Cloud, eh?" She answers, "Well, I'm-". All of a sudden, a white-haired man enters the room. He seems to be the captain of the airship, as he was wearing an old-fashioned captain's coat. " All right, that's enough, Terra. We have to find out where he came from. Now, who are you and what are you doing on my airship, the Blackjack?!? Are you a spy for the Empire?" He then drew a sword and points it at your face. Answer wrong and you might get into a battle you're not prepared for. What will you do?
112.title: On an unknown Airship!

1123.content:
Cloud quickly reaches for his buster sword, only to grab at air...
It takes a few moments for him to realize that his own sword is being pointed at him.
"Oh God." Thinks cloud

'Well? Looking for this?" Says the White haired man, with a grin on his face

"Actually....."

What does Cloud say?
1123.title: Prep for battle!

11232.content:
"No. I wasn't," said Cloud.

"Really...Then what were you reaching for?" Says the White haired man.

"My wallet...I need to check and make sure my Gil is still there."

"You callin' me a thief?!"

"No, I can tell that you're a gambling man, So I thought we could have a bet."

"Uh...Ya Guessed right...But what do you want to bet for?

"My Life."

"Ok, then. Pick your poison, I got a floating Casino here....."

"I was thinking a coin flip."

"HA-HA! Are you serious?! A Coin flip?! Not even a game of poker, so you'd live longer?"

"Nope. Coin flip"

"Ok then, Gimmie the coin!"
11232.title: Gambling with his life

112321.content:
Once Cloud handed over the coin, 'White hair' Flips it.

"Call it!" Yells 'White hair'

"Heads!" yells Cloud.

'White hair' checks the coin, "Damn. It is heads. Not my lucky day I guess"

"I win," says Cloud, "So may I stand up please?"

Grumbling, the white haired man nods assent.

Cloud stands up and asks ever-so politely, "May I please have my sword back?"

'White hair' shoots him a look that could level a city block, but hands it back.

"May I also have my Gil back?"

"Why?"

"It's mine"

"Fine....."

As the white haired man hands back the coin, it gets flipped over.

"What the...? This Coin has two heads!"

"Yep, comes in handy for bets."

'Why you...! YOU HUSTLED ME!!!"


"Well, you are the one that asked me for a coin....And by the way, you haven't introduced yourself."

"My name is Gambit, you thieving....."
112321.title: Cloud the Cheater

113.content: you see yourself on a pirateship you look around to see ,of course, pirates. are they friendly or not?
113.title: On a pirate ship.

choices: You ask the boy for his name.
You ask the boy if he's seen Tifa, Cid, Yuffie, or Aerith.
114.content:
You get up and see that you're in a strange town that you've never seen before.
All of a sudden, a bunch of creepy black things appear out of the shadows. They have long ears, and big, glowing, yellow eyes. You try to reach for your sword, but you realize that it's gone!
"Oh no, where's my sword?!" you say worried.
"Here, catch!" says a young boy with brown spikey hair, wearing red clothes.
"Thanks!" you say, catching your sword.
"Sorry I took it," he said. "I just wasn't sure why you brought the sword here, but now it's clear that you're here to help us fight! Right?"
"Well," you say. "I hadn't actually been planning anything.......I just suddenly woke up here!"
You see the boy bring out his sword. It just materializes in a beam of light. You see that it's shaped like a key.
"What kind of sword is that?" you ask him.
"Well.....supposedly," he said. "It's a keyblade."
"Interesting," you say. "Well, shall we take them?"
"You bet," he said.
You and the boy begin fighting those strange creatures. It takes a while, but finally you defeat all of them.
"Thanks for the help!" says the boy.
"No problem!" you say. "I have a question though....where are we?"
"Oh this is Traverse Town," he says smiling. "This is where people whose worlds have been destroyed come to."
What do you ask the boy now?
114.title: Heartless Attack

1141.content: So what is your name any way ? You ask . The name is Sora . The boy replied . Sora .... You replied . Yep and I think you should vist my friendes in this town . Sora said and You
1141.title: Cloud and Sora

choices: did you just say who's world was destroyed????
how do i get out of hear i need to find tifa and cid....
1142.content: you ask the boy if he's seen any of your friends "sorry i'm pretty new here myself" he replies
1142.title: You ask the boy if he's seen Tifa, Cid, Yuf...

choices: In an open field watching people fighting a huge monster(Sin-Calm Lands)
12.content:
You are Aeris.

"Whoa, the last thing I remember was Cloud coming in to save me from Sephiroth..." you say. "Am I alive?"

Where are you?
12.title: Where am I?

choices: Make the best of your time, and hang out with these three.
Try to find a way back to your world.
121.content:
You seem to be in a town of some sort. You look around and see three kids standing by you. Two boys and a girl.
"Hey, are you alright?" one of the boys asked.
He was wearing long camo shorts and had wavy/spikey blond hair.
"Yes, I guess I'm fine," you say. "At least I'm not dead."
"Why would you be anyway?" asks the other boy.
He was wearing a red muscle shirt with a white shirt underneath and blue jeans, had black hair that stuck up because of his headband. His shirt said dogstreet.
"Well," you say. "The last thing I remember before waking up here is being stabbed by a madman with a longsword...."
"Maybe you were dreaming?" says the girl.
She had long brown hair, wore an orange shirt with white flowers on the side, and had on yellow-ish short pants.
"No it couldn't have been a dream...." you say. "It was real! I swear!"
"Then," said the first boy. "You were transported here through a portal of some sort."
"Yes," said the other boy."It must have happened just before you were stabbed."
"Could be," you say.
"Hey," the girl says. "What's your name?"
"My name?" you ask. "Oh, right, my name is Aeris. What about you guys?"
"My name is Hayner," says the first boy.
"My name is Pence," says the other boy.
"And my name is Olette," says the girl. "Very nice to meet you Aeris!"
What should you do now?
121.title: Stange Things

1211.content:
"Hey, Aeris! We're going to the beach; you wanna come with us?" Olette exclaims, tugging on your arm.
"Uh..." you reply. "I've never been to the beach before..."
"Whoa, never been to beach! Don't worry, it's loads of fun," Hayner reassures you. "Besides, you look like you need the sun." You blush, because you are very pale indeed.
"Yeah, we just need the munny," Pence mutters, pulling out four ice cream bars and handing them out. You take one lick and you think it's the best tasting thing you've ever tried.
"I'm broke," you sigh.
"I got...480," Olette says.
"500," Pence adds.
"864," Hayner says. "How much is that all together?"
"1844 munny," Olette replies immediately. "We need about 2000 more."
"Ah, jeez. We'll go get jobs," Hayner groans, for he hates to work.
Do you...
1211.title: Complications

122.content:
"Whoa!" you say. "Where am I?"
"What is that?" you say.
"That's Sin!" said a blond boy of about 17."Please help us! We can talk later!"
"Okay!" you say. "I'll do my best!"
You begin to cast comet on Sin. The final blow was then dealt by a girl with short brown hair. You follow her and the blonde boy and 6 other people to their airship.
122.title: Huh?

choices: in the ruins at the beggining of FFX.
13.content:
You wake up.

The last thing you remember is being in the Blitzball Stadium in Zanarkand.

You look around and notice you are.....
13.title: Chapter One

131.content:
You see land so you decide to swim over to it.There is no one around anywhere but you must find shelter.You look around to try to find anything but there is nothing.

What do you do?
131.title: Chapter Two

choices: Keep fighting, don't give up yet.....
1311.content:
You keep running forward and end up falling back into the water but in a different area. Suddenly, monsters keep coming at you from nowhere.You keep fighting them but they keep multipling.

What do you do next?
1311.title: Ehhh....

choices: You fight this guy as well.
Run/swim away and cry for your mommy.
13111.content:
They start to run away and your thinking 'yeah, finally THEY give up!' but then you realize that there is an even bigger monster eating them and is heading your way.... (wow you're really not having a good day!)


What happens next?
13111.title: Ehhh.....2

choices: He lets out a roar and it pushes you into the cave.
131111.content:
You're not having as much luck with this guy as you did the little(er) ones. Then, you spot a cave.You swim towards it as fast as you can but the monster is catching up to you and soon you are half way in his mouth.....

What's gonna happen?
131111.title: uhhhh....title

choices: You write what happens next or it ends here.
1311111.content: You wake up and must find food,warmth,and shelter.
1311111.title: i don't know

choices: You write what happens next or it ends here.
1311112.content: Another Pinnochio story happens.(monster swallows you , gets tickled and sneezes you out 'somehow' and you end up in the cave.
1311112.title: pllllph

choices: Get freaked out and push her away.
1312.content:
Suddenly all that whistling sends you into the future and you seethat you and Yuna are kissing.

What happens next?
1312.title: im' done naming chapters

132.content:
You realize you are on Destiny Islands and that you have friends here.Riku (kh) comes up to you and says:

"Where have you been Tidus?"

Your response is.....
132.title: Chapter Two

choices: Leave the airship and go on with your life.
1321.content:
''I cant remember..Somewhere nice?'' you reply. Riku looks like he has heard it all before..SUDDENLY BARRETT appears outta nowhere ''YO YOU ^*$%**£$^!^$* EJITS!!''
Riku and you look EXTREMELY confused and wonder where the heck he came from.
''Yo we gotsta get outta here! This place aint' safe for a bunch of no good kids like you!''
You reply angrily ''HEY WE ARENT KIDS'' Barrett looks like hes had enough...
''YOU SURE BOUT THAT HUH?? YOU LOOK LIKE KIDS TO ME!! NOW GET INTO DAT AIRSHIP REAL QUICK OR ILL MAKE SURE DAT YOU WILL GO BACK TO YOUR MOMMY WITH A PICKLE JAR SHOVED UP YOUR NOSE!!!'' you decide to not argue with a man THAT serious... You get on the airship (With riku Sora and all the others) and find a man named Cid looking at barrett...Annoyed... ''WHAT DID YOO DO!!!''
Barret shouts ''I JUST BROUGHT THESE %&^$"£% WITH ME!!'' YOuve only been here 3 seconds and you are sick of it -_-
1321.title: " I can't remember."

choices: you scream and wake up the thing and it eats you.
You keep quiet and try to find a way out of there.
133.content:
You walk around and trip over a weird shaped rock.
A few seconds later a trap door opens underneath your feet.As you're falling down the deep,seemingly endless hole,you see a light.You fall onto a furry creature. Then you...
133.title: uhhhh.....yeah!

choices: the creature eating  you(5 minutes before now).
a bright light that leads to Spira.
1332.content:
Soon you run into a door that has an inscription ,that was in a different language, that read: Gaab uid! Drec ec dra myen uv y taytmo paycd! * this is in Al Bhed*

You open the door and you see.....
1332.title: uh oh....

13321.content: Well now, you're dead. There's only one option left......go back and try to save yourself by changing this ending(unless you like this one better. Well, in that case...The End).
13321.title: The End?

choices: Some creepy old guy who wanted a sex change.
141.content:
You're singing at the beggining of FFX-2
and you realize that it isn't really you singing.

Who is it?
141.title: Yuna! yeah!

choices: Yuna can't very well get rid of Leblanc on stage
Yuna asks Rikku and Paine for help
1411.content:
Yuna figured it wasn't her singing! "Leblanc!! Is that you?"

"Why, yes, love! I'm taking down the gullwings from within!"
1411.title: Leblanc.

1451.content: Only two choices for Cecil from final fansty4 and they are
1451.title: Cecil(FF4)

choices: In your bed, oh....it was only a dream.....
153.content: You are Vivi. You feel yourself being sucked into a portal. You then feel yourself being pushed out of it into an unknown world. The last thing you remember was meeting that boy Zidane. Now, where are you?
153.title: Confused...

choices: ...Show them why it's wrong to bully!!!
1532.content:
Everythings bright... the light hurts your sensative eyes. You dont remember much of what happened or how you got there... just Zidane. The light just gets brighter and brighter...

***

"...hey...you ok?"

You slowly start to regain conciousness... the first thing you see is a little boy staring down at you...

A short boy with brown hair and brown eyes wearing a little villager suit!

"Oh good! Youre ok!" he helps you up.

"Ugghh..." you look around... you seem to be in the middle of town... a totally different town youve never seen before! "W...where am I?"

"Oh, this is Twilight Town," he smiles at you, "Im Tom. Nice to meet you!"

"Uh... hi," you scratch your head, "Im Vivi."

Just then Tom turns his head, "Uh oh! Vivi, we gotta get moving! Seipher's gang's coming!"

"Who's Seipher?" you ask. But before you answer, someone shouts...

"THERE YOU ARE, YA LITTLE PIPSQUEAK!"

And a group runs up toward you and Tom... lead by a blonde guy in white clothing with a scar on his face (Seipher). His toadies are a buff tanned guy with short black hair and a little goatee (Rajin) and a white haired girl with a red eye and hair covering the other one (Fujin).

"Where were ya running off to?" Seipher smiles at Tom, "Thought you could leave without paying the fine?"

Tom steps behind you and starts shivering, "P..p...please, I allready paid you yesterday!"

"That was YESTERDAY'S fine!" Rajin grins, "Now ya gotta pay TODAY'S fine, y'know?"

"...Pay," Fujin says unemotionally.

Tom continues shivering, "Im...Im sorry... I dont get my allowance until next week!"

"Aw, that's too bad..." Seipher grins and cracks his knuckles, "Hope you dont value that little face of yours TOO much!"

But you step to Seipher and say, "Hey... leave the kid alone!"

"Oh... you must be new around here," Seipher says to you, "Move aside and we'll forget about your rudeness!"

"Step aside," Rajin tells you, "Unless youre feeling suicidal, y'know?"

"...Move." Fujin says showing no emotion.

You dont move... you stand your ground.

Seipher just smiles, "Oh... guess youre REALLY fond of pain then, arent ya chicken-wuss?"
1532.title: Encounter with the bullies...

15322.content: "No"you say defiantly"you can't just beat peole up, its wrong"."Urr, Rai show this pipsqueak how we deal with heroes"says Seifer."I'm gonna give you a world of pain y'know?"growls Raijin and swings a large fist at your hat. You lean backwards and points your staff at Rai, he is hit by a bolt of lightning and sent flying into a wall where he slumps down"he's tough y'know"mutters Rai before passing out."Fine! I'll handle you myself!"sneers Seifer and flings himself at you. You duck under him and he flies over you, you spin around and hit Seifer in the back with a jet of flames."Argh! You little pipsqueak!"yells Seifer."C'mon Vivi, lets go!"shouts Tom and begins to run out of the little room and down a corridor, then down some more stairs and finally they were outside but they didn't stop there, they continued to run until they bumped into a a boy in black clothes and to others who looked like a dog and a duck. All 5 of them hit the ground at the same time."oof!"they all say in unison. The boy gets up and pulls his companions up too."Hey watch where your goin'!"yells the duck crossly."Don't mind him"says the boy."W-w-we're ever so sorry S-s-s-sir"you say shyly."Well ya' should be!"Pipes up the duck again."Donald!"says the boy"stop being rude!"."Ah phooey!"grumbles the duck now confirmed as Donald."Hi I'm Sora and this is Donald and Goofy"says the boy, indicating to his friends."I'm Tom and this is...."says Tom to Sora."Vivi, my names Vivi"you say."Hey you! Pipsqueak!"yells a voice. You and Tom turn around, there is Seifer and his gang!"We have to go Vivi!"says Tom hurridly."Wait,wait,wait"says Sora"are they bullying you?". You and Tom just nod."Right!"says Sora angrily and marches over to the trio. There is some unheard talking and then Seifer and his gang reluctantly retreat into the shadows. Sora comes back over to the other 4."So why are you here?"he asks."Weeeel"Says Tom trying to remember"I was walking through the tram district and I saw a boy in a funny hat lying on the ground, so I walked over and he didn't seem to be concious so I took him hom"continued Tom"but when he woke up Seifer apeared and Vivi managed to hold them off whilst we ran and then we bumped into you and then you saved us"concluded Tom."Well whats your side of the story Vivi?"asks Sora."W-w-well I had just me this boy Zidane and then I blacked out and found myself lying on Tom's bed and then all parts with Seifer and his gang happened"you tell Sora."Ok! Well mabye we can help you get back to your friend Zidane"says Sora"ok?".You just nod"but where to begin I wonder?"ponders Tom.
15322.title: Giving it to the man!

154.content: Suddenly as he woke up he noticed himself in a/an...
154.title: Bartz(FF5)

155.title: Okay this is your last chance to choose!

1552.content: Terra from six or do you want other people?
1552.title: Terra(FF6)

info.brief_description: Where FF/KH characters meet up. Add to me I'll add to you.
info.description:
Choose a Final Fantasy character to be.
You somehow end up in another world and meet up with various Final Fantasy people. Please keep it PG 13.
Add to me I'll add to you on request.
